__e: The loneliness is stored up right down to his boots and it's driving him crazy.
And tell Him that today I saw my family for the first time after months of solitude and distress.
Solitude isn't good. Man isn't made to be alone.
It's the feeling that there might never be anybody ever again.
You too must know what loneliness is, despite your wife and son.
Instead of just knowing that you're alone all the time.
Not everyone has the chance to be alone like I have.
But it is the only way to be saved from a terrible loneliness.
